title: FIFA Dataset Web Scraping with Python
description: Analyze FIFA player data with Python using web scraping, preprocessing, EDA, and visualizations to uncover football insights.

title: Cricket Battle Simulator
description: A Python-based cricket game where users compete against the computer in batting and bowling. Features input validation, score tracking, and results display.

title: Quiz Competition Data Analysis Using Power BI
description: Developed a Power BI-based analysis for a quiz competition. Managed registrations, group formation, and visualized data effectively.
